thread.title: A Patriotic Parrot Marches Upright Across the Kitchen Floor to the Sound of a Military Band
thread.title_full: A Patriotic Parrot Marches Upright Across the Kitchen Floor to the Sound of a Military Band

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Patriotic Parrot Marches Upright Across the Kitchen Floor to the Sound of a Military Band

organizations.name: empty coconut shell across the ocean

text:
An adorably patriotic yellow-headed Amazon heard the sound of a military band and marched formally upright across the kitchen floor before disappearing out of view. 

via reddit 
Related Laughing Squid Posts Determined Octopus Walks an Empty Coconut Shell Across the Ocean Floor Apprehensive Cat Suddenly Breaks Out Into Strange Two-Legged Hop Across the Kitchen Floor A Playful Blue Macaw Parrot Learns How to Squeeze the Noisy Belly of a Lookalike Squeaky Toy
